data.name: OneLevelNamespaceTitle
data.value: Namespaces violation

data.name: OneLevelNamespaceMessage
data.value: Namespace '{0}' does not match the folder path and depth level. It was expected to be '{1}'.

data.name: OneLevelNamespaceDescription
data.value: Enforces that the namespace corresponds to the assembly name followed by the first directory level.

data.name: OneLevelNamespaceCodeFixTitle
data.value: Fix namespace

data.name: BlockSpacingTitle
data.value: Block spacing violation

data.name: BlockSpacingMessageAfterOpen
data.value: Block should start with a blank line

data.name: BlockSpacingMessageBeforeClose
data.value: Block should end with a blank line

data.name: BlockSpacingDescription
data.value: Enforces the insertion of a blank line at the beginning and end of blocks.

data.name: InitializerSpacingTitle
data.value: Initializer spacing violation

data.name: InitializerSpacingMessageRemoveAfterOpen
data.value: Initializer must not start with a blank line

data.name: InitializerSpacingMessageRemoveBetweenItems
data.value: There should be no blank lines between items

data.name: InitializerSpacingMessageRemoveBeforeClose
data.value: Initializer must not end with a blank line

data.name: InitializerSpacingDescription
data.value: Enforces that initializers do not begin or end with blank lines.

data.name: BlockSpacingCodeFixTitle
data.value: Insert blank line

data.name: InitializerSpacingCodeFixTitle
data.value: Remove blank line

data.name: ReturnSpacingTitle
data.value: Return statement spacing violation

data.name: ReturnSpacingMessage
data.value: Return statement must be preceded by a blank line

data.name: ReturnSpacingDescription
data.value: Enforces the insertion of a blank line before the return statement, unless it is on the same line as the previous statement or is the first statement in a block.

data.name: ReturnSpacingCodeFixTitle
data.value: Insert a blank line before the return statement

data.name: IndentationAlignmentTitle
data.value: Closing symbol alignment violation

data.name: IndentationAlignmentMessage
data.value: Closing symbol '{0}' must be aligned with the start of the line containing the opening symbol

data.name: IndentationAlignmentDescription
data.value: Enforces that closing symbols are aligned with the indentation of the line where the block starts.

data.name: IndentationAlignmentCodeFixTitle
data.value: Align closing symbol

data.name: LambdaParameterNamingTitle
data.value: Lambda parameter naming violation

data.name: LambdaParameterNamingMessage
data.value: The parameter '{0}' should be renamed to '{1}' to match its type

data.name: LambdaParameterNamingDescription
data.value: Enforces that lambda parameters use meaningful names derived from their type instead of single letters.

data.name: LambdaParameterNamingCodeFixTitle
data.value: Rename to '{0}'

data.name: StaticLambdaTitle
data.value: The expression can be static

data.name: StaticLambdaMessage
data.value: This expression does not capture any state and can be marked static

data.name: StaticLambdaDescription
data.value: Enforces the use of the static modifier on expressions that do not capture state.

data.name: StaticLambdaCodeFixTitle
data.value: Make expression static

data.name: SuffixNamingTitle
data.value: Suffix naming violation

data.name: SuffixNamingMessage
data.value: The type '{0}' should end with the suffix '{1}'

data.name: SuffixNamingDescription
data.value: Enforces that types inheriting from classes or implementing interfaces share the same suffix.

data.name: SuffixNamingCodeFixTitle
data.value: Rename to '{0}'

data.name: FileNamingTitle
data.value: File naming violation

data.name: FileNamingMessage
data.value: The file name '{0}' does not match the expected type name '{1}'

data.name: FileNamingDescription
data.value: Enforces that the file name matches the declared type name (or the first type name if multiple are present).

data.name: FileNamingCodeFixTitle
data.value: Rename file to '{0}'
